ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_SHORT: Platform bii day dimbali leen ci jàng njàngalem cheikh ahmadou bamba mbacké.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_LONG: Platform bii daf leen di jàppale ci jàng njàngalem Cheikh Ahmadou Bamba Mbacké. Kuur yi dañu leen jagleel ay klaas, ñu am quiz ngir gëna dooleel seen xam-xam. Njàngat bu nekk amna kontu boppam ngir topp seen jëm kanam. Carte yi ci suuf Ci suuf dañuy wane kategori yu wuute yi ci téere yi, loolu dina tax nga mëna jëfandikoo ay liggéey yuñ xaaj ci theme.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: MouridXam ab plateau la buñu jagleel tasaare njàngalem Cheikh Ahmadou Bàmba Mbàkke, jublu ci tax ay mbindam mann ci jullit yepp. Sunu wareef mooy sos jàngalekaay buy weccoo xalaat ak jaar-jaar ngir ku nekk, doonte xam-xam bimu am wala fimu nekk du ci dara.
